name: No Pictures Please (2015)
description:
This is my participation to the 33rd edition of Ludum Dare ! In this game you are an evil creature living in a cave. Some explorers want to take pictures of you but you can't allow it. That's why you are going to kill them all before get out of the cave.

Some mechanics include hitting someone, throwing its body on other explorers or creating a shock wave that will make stalactites fall. The game is a mix of reflection and good timing. There are 14 levels. I wish I had time to make more but I had no time.

The game was created using C++ and the SFML library.

Results (among 1198 participants) :

#108 Fun 3.66
#155 Overall 3.62
#172 Innovation 3.50
#188 Theme 3.83
#259 Mood 3.30
#330 Humor 3.00
#412 Audio 2.85
#475 Graphics 3.07

Link to the game in the LD website
